result.eng: At the end of the day, though, these accusations cannot be proven.
result.ga: I ndeireadh an lae ámh ní féidir na líomhaintí seo a chruthú

result.ponchtml: I ndeireaḋ an lae áṁ ní féidir na líoṁaintí seo a ċruṫúAt the end of the day, though, these accusations cannot be proven.
